songs.title: Kids Again
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
We'll be whoever we wanna be
We'll laugh in the face of the teachers
We'll see wherever we wanna see
Run away from home, they'll never reach us

[Pre-Chorus]
I wanna feel oh so young today
I don't wanna do whatever they tell me
I wanna feel oh so young today
So let's behave like kids again

[Chorus]
Kids again, kids again
Let's behave like kids again
Kids again, kids again
Let's behave like kids again

[Verse 2]
We'll be whoever we wanna be
Behave like despicable creatures
We'll see wherever we wanna see
We don't need Nintendos or Adidas

[Pre-Chorus]

[Chorus]

[Link]
I'm happy with you
But I need the truth
And I miss my youth
It was oh so simple
I'm happy with you
But I need the truth
And I miss my youth
It was oh so simple

[Hook]

[Link]
